title: Freshcaller training video

title: How to transfer a phone call to another agent
text: Please do not ask customers to call us if we need to talk to them about an existing ticket - arrange a time to call them from Freshcaller. This keeps the hotline free for P1s. Transferring to another agent - please see https://support.freshcaller.com/en/support/solutions/articles/238083-transferring-calls You can also call someone else while keeping the customer on hold - see How to make parallel calls : Freshdesk Contact Center (freshcaller.com)
description:
Please do not ask customers to call us if we need to talk to them about an existing ticket - arrange a time to call them from Freshcaller. This keeps the hotline free for P1s.


Transferring to another agent - please see https://support.freshcaller.com/en/support/solutions/articles/238083-transferring-calls 


You can also call someone else while keeping the customer on hold - see How to make parallel calls : Freshdesk Contact Center (freshcaller.com)

title: Check for blocked calls and unblock contacts
text: TABLE OF CONTENTS Why Might Callers be Blocked? Check for blocked calls Unblock contacts Why Might Callers be Blocked? If a contact has been deleted, emails and calls from that caller will be blocked/sent to spam. This is usually fine, but if a contact has been deleted which had a shared phone number on it (e.g. an office or shop number), then that number will be blocked. If a customer can't get through on the phone, then use the steps here to check and unblock. Check for blocked calls Go to Call Metrics : Freshcaller In case you see in the call metric that there is a blocked caller like shown below, you need to check the status of the contact. It could be that a contact is deleted because of some "spam" email, but if the contact record also contains a phone number in "mobile phone" that number will be blocked for calls as well. Unblock contacts To unblock the contact, you can click on the contacts name in the call log. This will open the contacts information page. If it is contact that belongs to a customer, and should be able to call us, you can unblock the contact by selecting RESTORE
description:
TABLE OF CONTENTS

  • Why Might Callers be Blocked?
  • Check for blocked calls
  • Unblock contacts


Why Might Callers be Blocked?

If a contact has been deleted, emails and calls from that caller will be blocked/sent to spam. This is usually fine, but if a contact has been deleted which had a shared phone number on it (e.g. an office or shop number), then that number will be blocked. If a customer can't get through on the phone, then use the steps here to check and unblock.


Check for blocked calls


Go to Call Metrics : Freshcaller

In case you see in the call metric that there is a blocked caller like shown below, you need to check the status of the contact.
It could be that a contact is deleted because of some "spam" email, but if the contact record also contains a phone number in "mobile phone" that number will be blocked for calls as well. 



Unblock contacts


To unblock the contact, you can click on the contacts name in the call log.


This will open the contacts information page.

If it is contact that belongs to a customer, and should be able to call us, you can unblock the contact by selecting RESTORE

title: Freshcaller Status - How to make yourself available or unavailable
text: In Freshcaller you have to set your workstatus to receive calls and to let your colleagues know your work status. This is done by opening Freshcaller and then open the status list. Afterwards you choose the correct status: Availible: Your are on and ready to take calls. Offline: you won't receive calls, if you close your browser down it will show you as offline. But as soon as you open a Freshdesk tab it will set you back to the status you had when you closed the tab.
description:
In Freshcaller you have to set your workstatus to receive calls and to let your colleagues know your work status.

This is done by opening Freshcaller and then open the status list.


Afterwards you choose the correct status:

Availible: Your are on and ready to take calls.
Offline: you won't receive calls, if you close your browser down it will show you as offline. But as soon as you open a Freshdesk tab it will set you back to the status you had when you closed the tab.

title: Phone Number Format
text: Freshcaller needs the country code when calling numbers from contacts stored in Freshdesk. So to avoid issues, for clarity, and to enable anyone in any country to call any customer, please start all phone numbers with the country code (use a plus because two zeroes doesn't work). This means removing the leading zero on a phone number if there is one. Examples: UK +441227865294 This above number would normally be 01227865294 if dialled from a UK phone, but we remove the leading zero and add the UK country code +44 Denmark +4597823434 This above number would normally be 97823434 if dialled from a DK phone. To call add the DK country code +45 Sweden +46705852822 This above number would normally be 0705852822 if dialled from a SE phone,but we remove the leading zero and add the SE country code +46 Norway +4798239002 This above number would normally be 98239002 if dialled from a NO phone.To call add the NO country code +47 Germany +493028878817 This above number would normally be 03028878817 if dialled from a DE phone,but we remove the leading zero and add the DE country code +49
description:
Freshcaller needs the country code when calling numbers from contacts stored in Freshdesk. So to avoid issues, for clarity, and to enable anyone in any country to call any customer, please start all phone numbers with the country code (use a plus because two zeroes doesn't work).

This means removing the leading zero on a phone number if there is one.


Examples:


UK

+441227865294

This above number would normally be 01227865294 if dialled from a UK phone, but we remove the leading zero and add the UK country code +44


Denmark

+4597823434 

This above number would normally be 97823434 if dialled from a DK phone. To call add the DK country code +45


Sweden

+46705852822 

This above number would normally be 0705852822 if dialled from a SE phone,but we remove the leading zero and add the SE country code +46


Norway

+4798239002

This above number would normally be 98239002 if dialled from a NO phone.To call add the NO country code +47


Germany

+493028878817

This above number would normally be 03028878817 if dialled from a DE phone,but we remove the leading zero and add the DE country code +49

title: Calling to a restricted Country - Lift restrictions in Freshcaller
text: You may find that a customer calls you from abroad and that you don´t have the opportunity to call you back due to restrictions in the setup. You can contact your manager to get a lifted restriction. Go to setup in FreshCaller - Chose Admin settings- Click on dropdown menu - Mange numbers - Chose "Restricted Countries". Select country and remove restriction
description:
You may find that a customer calls you from abroad and that you don´t have the opportunity to call you back due to restrictions in the setup.

 You can contact your manager to get a lifted restriction.  

 

Go to setup in FreshCaller - Chose Admin settings- Click on dropdown menu - Mange numbers - 

Chose "Restricted Countries".

Select country and remove restriction

title: Having trouble with sound settings. Can't make a phonecall in Freshcaller.
text: TABLE OF CONTENTS Problem Error Cause Solution Audio settings PC Problem If you can not make a phone call in Freshdesk / Freshcaller the problem can be the sound settings in your browser or PC audio settings. Error If you try to call a number it doesn't ring and this message stays for ever: If you click on the number you wil get this error Cause The call could gets stuck in the connecting state when Freshcaller is unable to connect to a microphone. Solution Try the below steps in the browser: Check this icon in the left corner of your browser's search bar. Check whether the Notification, Microphone, and Sound are allowed in the site setting in the Agent's browser. If the option is not available, please select the Site Settings tab and enable it. Also, please do check if you have allowed "All cookies" from your browser's privacy settings as shown below. Audio settings PC In case you are listening musik at home using an external speaker or using the laptop speakers for other apps AND you are using a headset for FreshCaller, you will have to use an other browser for this. Because FD is using the same browser it is not possible to change the audio settings for FD only. Normally you can do that for several apps. So using an other browser like Edge to play the music and use FD in Chrome. Then you can set the audio separately for these two browsers.
description:
TABLE OF CONTENTS

  • Problem
  • Error
  • Cause
  • Solution
  • Audio settings PC

Problem

If you can not make a phone call in Freshdesk / Freshcaller the problem can be the sound settings in your browser or PC audio settings.


Error

If you try to call a number it doesn't ring and this message stays for ever: 

 

If you click on the number you wil get this error

Cause

The call could gets stuck in the connecting state when Freshcaller is unable to connect to a microphone. 


Solution

Try the below steps in the browser:


Check this icon in the left corner of your browser's search bar.

Check whether the Notification, Microphone, and Sound are allowed in the site setting in the Agent's browser.  

If the option is not available, please select the Site Settings tab and enable it.

Also, please do check if you have allowed "All cookies" from your browser's privacy settings as shown below.




Audio settings PC

In case you are listening musik at home using an external speaker or using the laptop speakers for other apps AND you are using a headset for FreshCaller, you will have to use an other browser for this.

Because FD is using the same browser it is not possible to change the audio settings for FD only. 

Normally you can do that for several apps.

So using an other browser like Edge to play the music and use FD in Chrome.

Then you can set the audio separately for these two browsers.

title: Adding/removing persons from Freshdesk / Freshcaller groups
text: This process can be used for normal configuring of new people, or if you need to temporarily add people to other groups to cover absences on the phone line, for example./ 1. Go into the Freshdesk - Open the Admin module 2. Choose - Team - Choose "Groups" 3. Choose Team - Add/ remove or search for a user. 4. Check connection before closing app
description:
This process can be used for normal configuring of new people, or if you need to temporarily add people to other groups to cover absences on the phone line, for example./


1. Go into the Freshdesk  - Open the Admin module



2. Choose - Team - Choose "Groups"


3. Choose Team - Add/ remove or search for a user.



4. Check connection before closing app
